mapper.select: select e.evaluate , e.create_time , e.evaluate_id , e.user_id , u.user_name ,i.origin_path as user_image , e.score from shop_commodity_evaluate e left join user_info u on u.uid = e.user_id join image i on i.image_id=u.user_image where e.commodity_id = #{commodityId} and e.status = 0 and u.status = 0 LIMIT ${pageNum},${pageSize}

SELECT e.evaluate,e.evaluate_id,e.create_time,u.`uid`,u.`user_image`,u.`user_name` FROM shop_commodity_evaluate e LEFT JOIN user_info u ON e.`user_id` = u.`uid` WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityId} LIMIT 0,10
